channel.title: Comments on: The Quest For Soup

item.title: By: karima
item.dc:creator: karima
item.description: I wholeheartedly agree. I like just about everything, but COLD SOUP! It's almost an oxymoron. The mere thought of it causes the hair on my arms to stand at attention and scream,"NO!" Give me something steamy to dunk my crusty bread into.
item.content:encoded:
I wholeheartedly agree. I like just about everything, but COLD SOUP! It’s almost an oxymoron. The mere thought of it causes the hair on my arms to stand at attention and scream,”NO!”
Give me something steamy to dunk my crusty bread into.
